lines.text: Excuse me. I seem to have caught you in the middle of something.
We're just havin' a little fun. I mean, up till now, it's just been swattin' moskeeters. Now we're gonna hang us a Reb.
Get 'im down.
What for? You're a Yankee aintcha?
That's right.
Well this man's a Reb! A damned Reb! Why you botherin'?
Usually wouldn't. Cept this one happens to be my brother.
[Mac cocks his pistol and points it at the outlaw]
Get him down.
[Chuckles as he hurriedly pulls on his boots]
This seems to remind you of something, don't it?
Yeah, only it was the other way around.
Old Man Childers' barn?
Yeah. I seem to recall his daughter was there too, and her brothers comin' after ya.
Yeah, I had a helluva time pullin' my boots on.
It wasn't just your boots, little brother.
I don't know nothin' bout Mexico. Dal?
Not much.
Jesse?
[Jesse shakes his head]
I know someone who does. Jack Traven.
You are talkin' about Uncle Black Jack Traven?
Yessir.
Well, big brother, you know there are some people who call him scoundrel.
[Dal Grins]
Some might even call him an outlaw.
[Dal grins bigger]
And we all know he's a rogue. Sides, we don't know where to find 'im.
Converse County Jail.

[Shrugs]
What are we waitin' for?
Jack Traven's going back to Texas.
We're all goin' back to Texas. Uncle Jack's is ridin' with us.
You boys busted your Uncle jack outta jail, now I'm willin' to let that slide.
You ain't got no authority down here. What'd he do anyhow?
What'd he DO? This man's a horse thief, a renegade, a double dealin' lyin' womanizin'...
Womanizin' ain't against the law.
Go ahead. Tell 'em, Gillette, how you been sittin' on your rump all these year and all of a sudden you start chasin' me till I 'bout turned into raw meat.
You just been runnin' loose too long.
There's more to it than that. You tell 'em or I will.
I'll carve your tongue out , Jack.
Better tell us, Miles
He's... he's been after my wife.
That ain't all of it. That wife of yours has been after me for years. And I just got tired of runnin.
I... I caught 'em together, and I'm gonna take him in.
You take one Traven, you gotta take 'em all.
Blue, grey, it doesn't matter, a man fights for what he believes in.
